mapper.select: SELECT SUPQUE.totalOfRecord, S.StoreId, S.StoreName FROM tblStore S, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalOfRecord FROM tblStore S WHERE S.statusId = 1 OR S.statusId = 2 ) AS SUPQUE WHERE S.statusId = 1 OR S.statusId = 2 ORDER BY S.StoreName

SELECT S.StoreId, S.StoreName, S.ImageURL, S.Address, S.AnalyzedTime, TD.DistrictId, TD.DistrictName, TC.CityId, TC.CityName, S.CreatedTime, S.UpdatedTime, S.ReasonInactive, TU.UserId, TU.Username, TU.Fullname, TU.imageURL AS MANAGER_IMG, S.StatusId, TS.StatusName FROM tblStore S LEFT JOIN tblUserStoreMapping TUSM ON (S.StoreId = TUSM.StoreId AND TUSM.StatusId = 1) LEFT JOIN tblUser TU ON (TUSM.UserId = TU.UserId) LEFT JOIN tblDistrict TD ON (S.DistrictId = TD.DistrictId) LEFT JOIN tblCity TC ON (TD.CityId = TC.CityId) LEFT JOIN tblStatus TS ON (S.StatusId = TS.StatusId) WHERE S.StoreId = #{storeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblStore (StoreName, ImageURL, Address, AnalyzedTime, CreatedTime, UpdatedTime, DistrictId, StatusId) VALUES (#{storeName}, #{imageUrl}, #{address}, #{analyzedTime}, convert_tz(now(),@@session.time_zone,'+07:00'), convert_tz(now(),@@session.time_zone,'+07:00'), #{districtId}, #{statusId})
mapper.update: UPDATE tblStore SET StatusId = #{statusId}, ReasonInactive = #{reasonInactive}, UpdatedTime = convert_tz(now(),@@session.time_zone,'+07:00') WHERE StoreId = #{storeId}
